channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Despite Being Sued by Nearly Every Record Label, This AI Startup Just Hit a $2.45 Billion Valuation
item.description: Suno is a platform for AI music generation. It just raised $250 million in its series C round.

item.title: Scott Galloway Expects Market Crash Within a Year. Here’s What to Buy
item.description: The entrepreneur and NYU Stern Marketing professor predicts a critical correction that could cut the Magnificent 7 in half.

item.title: If Nvidia Stumbles, Pay Attention to Apple
item.description: Nvidia’s stock market performance this week is a crack in the data center premise. Edge compute just might burst the buildout bubble.

item.title: This International Whisky Giant Is Closing One of It’s Facilities for Scotch
item.description: The company reported a pause in production, but one source warns of a likely extended closure.

item.title: Sotheby’s Tried to Auction a $10 Million Golden Toilet—It Got Awkward Fast

item.title: Target’s CEO is betting billions that Gen Zers will get off their phones and fuel a comeback
item.description: Target will invest billions in stores to fuel a comeback amid declining sales.

item.title: Wisconsin archaeologists unearth a prehistoric lake ‘parking lot’ by mapping the location of 16 ancient canoes
item.description: It shows how long the Ho-Chunk tribe has lived in the region "and how deeply connected we remain to these waters and lands,” said Bill Quackenbush.

item.title: Gustav Klimt portrait that played life-saving role in Holocaust sets modern art record of $236 million at auction
item.description: "Portrait of Elisabeth Lederer" was considered "too Jewish" to be worth stealing by the Nazis, but it played a role in saving its subject's life.
